mapper.select: SELECT QUEST_NO /* prGoodsQaAnsInfo.getGoodsQAAnsList */ , ANS_SEQ , ANS_CONT , ANS_DISP_STAT_CD , TO_CHAR(ANS_DISP_PROC_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ANS_DISP_PROC_DTM , ANS_DISP_PROCMN_ID , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_GOODS_QA_ANS_INFO WHERE QUEST_NO = #{questNo} ORDER BY ANS_SEQ
